description: Forgot your alarm clock at home and need a quick replacement on a holiday? Vegas Alarm Clock for Touchpad is a simple and easy to use utility app that can be used for setting alarms for a particular date and time. Snooze functionality to help you sleep a bit longer has also been provided. You can select your favorite wall paper from a list of 13 beautiful wall papers from Las Vegas Strip. A virtual travel to the best locations of the Strip. You can also select your favorite ringtone from the list of touchpad ringtones. The features in Vegas Alarm Clock is the same as that of Alarm Clock.
